question: Teesta Rangit Tourism Festival 2017 was started in __________.
explanation: The five-day Teesta Rangit Tourism Festival 2017 started in Darjeeling. The Teesta Rangit Tourism festival will be held in separate phases in different places of Darjeeling and Kalimpong districts. It will be held in Darjeeling from December 27 to 29, in Kurseong from December 28 to 29, in Kalimpong from December 29 to 30 and in Mirik from December 30 to 31. This festival is organized by Gorkhaland Territorial Administration (GTA) and Darjeeling state tourism department and information and cultural affairs department.
